data.actual_result: The bottom margin is bigger than it should be
data.expected_result: The bottom margin of the text should be as is
data.short_description: Edited single-line codeblocks have an extra space below the text in the mini-preview you get when you hold on the message
data.steps_to_repro: - Send a message - Edit it into a single-line codeblock in anyway you want - Hold on the codeblock to get the mini-preview - Observe the space below the text
